archimate:Requirement.name: PM.2.1.11f: f) demonstrating return on investment (e.g. using expected reductions in losses due to inappropriate human behaviour and the cost of the SETA programme annually).
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
